         var kitLinkURL;
var kitPrice;
var cartInterval;

function checkImagesLoaded() {
    var dropDown = document.getElementById('ddKits');
    //split the values
    var arrValues = dropDown.options[dropDown.selectedIndex].value.split('|');
    kitLinkURL = arrValues[0];

    for (var i = 0; i &lt; gImages.length; i++) {
        if (!gImages[i].complete) {
            return;
        }
    }    
    window.clearInterval(cartInterval);    
    location.href = kitLinkURL;
}

function addKitToCart()
{   
    dcsMultiTrack();
    cartInterval = window.setInterval("checkImagesLoaded()", 20);
}

         <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
          var divAuthorTrackerForm = document.getElementById("divAuthorTrackerForm");
    var divAuthors = document.getElementById("divAuthors");
    var arrAuthors = divAuthors.getElementsByTagName("input");
    var txtEmail = document.getElementById("txtEmail");
    var ddFormat = document.getElementById("ddFormat");
    var ddMonth = document.getElementById("ddMonth");
    var ddDay = document.getElementById("ddDay");
    var ddYear = document.getElementById("ddYear");
    var divResponse = document.getElementById("divResponse");
    
    function atSignupRequest(arrSignupIds, emailAddress, mailFormat, coppaDate) {
        this.siteId = 5;
        this.arrSignupIds = arrSignupIds;
        this.emailAddress = emailAddress;
        this.mailFormat = mailFormat;
        this.reqHandler = "/Services/AuthorTrackerSubscribe.aspx";
        
        if (typeof(coppaDate) !== "undefined") {
            this.coppaDate = coppaDate;
        }
        this.req = null;
    }
    
    atSignupRequest.prototype.makeRequest = function() {
        
        this.req = getXMLHTTPRequest();
        if (this.req) {
            var loader = this;
            this.req.onreadystatechange = function() {
                loader.onReadyState.call(loader);
            }

            if (typeof(this.coppaDate) !== "undefined") {
                this.req.open("GET", this.reqHandler + "?email=" + this.emailAddress + "&amp;authid=" + this.arrSignupIds + "&amp;format=" + this.mailFormat + "&amp;m=" + (this.coppaDate.getMonth()+1) + "&amp;d=" + this.coppaDate.getDate() + "&amp;y=" + this.coppaDate.getUTCFullYear() + "&amp;sid=" + this.siteId, true);
            } else {
                this.req.open("GET", this.reqHandler + "?email=" + this.emailAddress + "&amp;authid=" + this.arrSignupIds + "&amp;format=" + this.mailFormat + "&amp;sid=" + this.siteId, true);
            }
            this.req.send(null);
        }
    }
    
    atSignupRequest.prototype.onReadyState = function() {
        var req = this.req;
        if (req.readyState == 4) {
            if (req.status == 200) {
                switch(req.responseText)
                {
                    case "0":                
                        divResponse.innerHTML = "Thank you for your subscription!&lt;br /&gt;&lt;span class=\"blue\"&gt;&laquo;&lt;/span&gt; &lt;a href=\"\" onclick=\"atReset(); return false;\" class=\"sbA\"&gt;Back&lt;/a&gt;";
                        divAuthorTrackerForm.style.display = "none";
                        divResponse.style.display = "block";
                        break;
                    //cases 1 and 2 should never happen b/c they are trapped before form is submitted
                    case "1": //invalid email address
                        divResponse.innerHTML = "The email that you entered was not valid. Please try again.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;span class=\"blue\"&gt;&laquo;&lt;/span&gt; &lt;a href=\"\" onclick=\"atReset(); return false;\" class=\"sbA\"&gt;Back&lt;/a&gt;";
                        divAuthorTrackerForm.style.display = "none";
                        divResponse.style.display = "block";
                        break;
                    case "2": //no author ids submitted
                        divResponse.innerHTML = "You did not select any authors to sign up for. Please try again.&lt;br /&gt;&lt;span class=\"blue\"&gt;&laquo;&lt;/span&gt; &lt;a href=\"\" onclick=\"atReset(); return false;\" class=\"sbA\"&gt;Back&lt;/a&gt;";
                        divAuthorTrackerForm.style.display = "none";
                        divResponse.style.display = "block";
                        break;
                    case "3": //coppa under 13
                        divResponse.innerHTML = "Sorry, but we are unable to process your request at this time.";
                        divAuthorTrackerForm.style.display = "none";
                        divResponse.style.display = "block";
                        break;
                }
            } else {
                alert('There was a problem with the web server. Please try again later.');
            }
        }
    }
    
    function atSignup() {
        if (!isEmailAddress(txtEmail.value)) {
            alert("Please enter a valid email address.");

        } else if (!isDate(ddMonth.value + "/" + ddDay.value + "/" + ddYear.value)) {
            //no error msg required, handled by function call

        } else {
            var arrSignups = new Array();
            
            if (arrAuthors.length &gt; 0) { //for multiple authors
                for (i=0; i &lt; arrAuthors.length; i++) {
                    if ((arrAuthors[i].checked) == true) {
                        arrSignups[i] = arrAuthors[i].value;
                    }
                }
            } else { //for single author
                //this will be zero if there are 2 authors
                arrSignups[0] = 13318;
            }
            
            if (arrSignups.length &lt; 1) {
                alert("Please choose the authors \nyou would like to sign up for.");
            } else {
                //form was successfully completed
                
                var dob = new Date(ddMonth.value + "/" + ddDay.value + "/" + ddYear.value);
                var pageReq = new atSignupRequest(arrSignups, txtEmail.value, ddFormat.selectedIndex, dob);
                
                pageReq.makeRequest();
            }
        }
    }
    
    function atReset() {
        divAuthorTrackerForm.style.display = "block";
        divResponse.style.display = "none";
        /*
        txtEmail.value = "";
        ddFormat.selectedIndex = 0;
        for (i=0; i &lt; arrAuthors.length; i++) {
            arrAuthors[i].checked = false;
        }
        */
    }
    
   	function isEmailAddress(string)
	{
        var addressPattern = /^\w+((-\w+)|(\.\w+))*\@[A-Za-z0-9]+((\.|-)[A-Za-z0-9]+)*\.[A-Za-z0-9]+$/;
        return addressPattern.test(string);
	}
	
	txtEmail.onkeypress = function(ev)
	{
	    ev = ev || window.event;
        
        if (ev.keyCode == 13) {
            atSignup();
            ev.cancelBubble = true;
            return false;
        }
	}

      function isDate(dateStr) 
      {
        var datePat = /^(\d{1,2})(\/|-)(\d{1,2})(\/|-)(\d{4})$/;
        var matchArray = dateStr.match(datePat); // is the format ok?

        if (matchArray == null) 
        {
          alert("Please enter date using the drop-down menus provided.");
          return false;
        }
    
        month = matchArray[1];
        day = matchArray[3];
        year = matchArray[5];
           
        if (month &lt; 1 || month &gt; 12) { // check month range
            alert("Month must be between 1 and 12.");
            return false;
        }

        if (day &lt; 1 || day &gt; 31) {
            alert("Day must be between 1 and 31.");
            return false;
        }

        if ((month==4 || month==6 || month==9 || month==11) &amp;&amp; day==31) {
            alert("Month "+month+" doesn't have 31 days!")
            return false;
        }
        
        if (year &lt; 1890)
        {
		      alert("Please enter a valid birth year");
		      return false;
        }

        if (month == 2) { // check for february 29th
            var isleap = (year % 4 == 0 &amp;&amp; (year % 100 != 0 || year % 400 == 0));
            if (day &gt; 29 || (day==29 &amp;&amp; !isleap)) {
                alert("February " + year + " doesn't have " + day + " days!");
                return false;
            }
        }
        return true; // date is valid
        
      }
         </script>
